EmailTemplate.name: Calling No Contact Day 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Do you have 10 minutes to talk today?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Give us just 10 minutes to find a solution that works best for your business, and we promise you won't regret it.
Over 10,000 businesses have trusted RapidAdvance as an alternative to traditional small business loans.
Call me at 877-252-9728 and let’s help your business grow with more financing.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvance®
1001 Woodward Ave, Suite 1700 | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
